TEXT.TITLE: KANSAS POWER/LIGHT <KAN> NAMES CHIEF EXECUTIVE
TEXT.BODY: Kansas Power and Light Co said it named David Black as chief executive officer. It said he will succeed William Wall after the May Five annual meeting. It said Black is the company's senior vice president, law. Reuter
